meanings.definition: An opening or hole in a bone or tissue through which nerves and blood vessels pass.
meanings.sent1: The foramens in the skull allow nerves to travel safely.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the foramens in the body to understand its structure.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse tried to hide in the foramens of the wall, thinking it was a secret tunnel.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like foramens, letting in all the light and beauty of the world.
meanings.sent5: The ancient map showed the hidden foramens leading to the treasure chest.
